about_the_game:
SOLO DEVELOPER

The game is NOT A TRIPLE A GAME, it is programmed and funded by one person (cat_anon), so don't expect a triple A game.

DEMO (INFO)

This product includes the first mission of the REC game, the mission where the Ukrainian plan to cause a nuclear war is discovered, the mission contains a very short gameplay that I will try to lengthen with updates and a large number of bodycam style shootings.

Gameplay

The game features a sophisticated aiming system with a deadzone mechanic, adding to the realism and challenge of combat. While the primary focus is on delivering a visually striking experience, the combat sequences are designed to be dynamic and engaging. Each map is meticulously detailed, offering unique environments and scenarios that keep the gameplay fresh and exciting. Prepare for a gripping, visually immersive journey as you fight your way to uncover the truth and prevent a catastrophic war.

WARNING

This game is in no way connected to wars currently going on and has nothing to do with real life politics, the video game is a total fantasy story and makes no reference to real politicians or people, please be sure to distinguish reality from a game!!!

content_descriptors.notes: REC is a hyper realistic game containing blood, death, shootings etc... if you are a minor please avoid the game.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows 10
  • Processor: I5 10gen
  • Graphics: RTX 3060 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • VR Support: No
  • Additional Notes: These are the minimum recommended settings for playing at medium graphics to have a good experience.

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows 11
  • Processor: I5 10gen
  • Graphics: RTX4070 12GB
  • DirectX: Version 12

  • VR Support: No
